price: Они не говоре док то Он не одобри и поступају онако како Он нареди.
arabic: لَا يَسۡبِقُونَهُۥ بِٱلۡقَوۡلِ وَهُم بِأَمۡرِهِۦ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: lā yasbiqūnahu bil-qawli wahum bi-amrihi yaʿmalūna
